良いとして: (いいとして) - (as 〜はいいとして, used to change the topic) enough about ...
良い事: (よいこと) - good thing/nice thing; (usu. as 〜を良いことに(して))  good excuse/good grounds/good opportunity; interjection used to impress an idea or to urge a response
良い伝が有る: (よいつてがある) - to have a good connection
良い出足: (よいであし) - good turnout of people; good start
良い天気: (いいてんき) - fine weather; fair weather
良い度胸: (いいどきょう) - some nerve (as in 'you must have some nerve to ...')
良い引きが有る: (よいひきがある) - to have a strong pull
良い感じ: (よいかんじ) - pleasant feeling; good vibes
良い成績を上げる: (よいせいせきをあげる) - to achieve satisfactory results
良い所取り: (よいとこどり) - focusing on only the good points or strong points; incorporating the benefits (while ignoring the drawbacks); picking the best of both (everything); cherry-picking (e.g. information)
良い日を選ぶ: (よいひをえらぶ) - to choose a lucky (auspicious) day
良い線: (よいせん) - more or less right; you are on the right track; getting warm
良い線を行く: (よいせんをいく) - to be on the right track; to go well
良い線行く: (よいせんいく) - to be on the right track; to go well
良い薬になる: (いいくすりになる) - to learn a lesson (usu. from an unpleasant experience); to be good for someone
良い迷惑: (いいめいわく) - (the いい is ironic) real nuisance; becoming inconvenienced by someone else's problems (through no fault of one's own)
良い頃: (よいころ) - high time; about time
良かれ: (よかれ) - all for the best; what is right
良かれと思う: (よかれとおもう) - (often as 良かれと思って) to wish to go well; to have good intentions
良かれ悪しかれ: (よかれあしかれ) - good or bad; right or wrong; for better or for worse; rightly or wrongly
良かろう: (よかろう) - that's right; very well; it would be best to ...
良きにつけ悪しきにつけ: (よきにつけあしきにつけ) - for better or worse; for good or for evil
良きにはからえ: (よきにはからえ) - take care of it; I'll leave it up to you; do as you see fit
良きに計らえ: (よきにはからえ) - take care of it; I'll leave it up to you; do as you see fit
良くある: (よくある) - is often the case
良くあるご質問: (よくあるごしつもん) - frequently asked questions; FAQ
良くある事だが: (よくあることだが) - as often is the case
良くある御質問: (よくあるごしつもん) - frequently asked questions; FAQ
良くしたもの: (よくしたもの) - convenient thing/harmonious, well-made thing; things always work out
良くする: (よくする) - to make good/to improve; to do often; to do well
良くなる: (よくなる) - to become better; to improve
良くも悪くも: (よくもわるくも) - for better or worse; for good and bad; regardless of merit; both good and bad
良くも悪しくも: (よくもあしくも) - regardless of right or wrong; regardless of merit; both good and bad
良く伸びるクリーム: (よくのびるクリーム) - well-spreading cream
良く効く薬: (よくきくくすり) - very efficacious medicine
良く言う: (よくいう) - to say enough (as much as required)/to say plenty; to say well/to say cleverly/to say elegantly; to say often/to say frequently; (oft. as an admonition in the form of よく言うよ) to say without shame/to say impudently
良ければ: (よければ) - if it is good
良さげ: (よさげ) - seemingly good; (of) good appearance; looking good
良さそう: (よさそう) - looking good; sounding good; (of) good appearance
良さ気: (よさげ) - seemingly good; (of) good appearance; looking good
良し: (えし) - (adj-ku)  good; excellent; fine; nice; pleasant; agreeable
良しとする: (よしとする) - to deem acceptable; to approve of; to value; to consider a good thing
良し悪し: (よしわるし) - right or wrong; good or bad; merits or demerits; quality; suitability
良久: (りょうきゅう) - for a good while
良二千石: (りょうにせんせき) - competent local official
良人: (りょうにん) - (phrase used by wives to their husbands as a form of address)  husband; good person
良妻賢母: (りょうさいけんぼ) - (yoji) good wife and wise mother
良家: (りょうか) - good family; respectable family; decent family
良導体: (りょうどうたい) - good conductor (of heat, etc.)
良心が咎める: (りょうしんがとがめる) - to have a guilty conscience; to have (something) lie heavy on one's conscience
良心の呵責: (りょうしんのかしゃく) - pangs of conscience
良心の囚人: (りょうしんのしゅうじん) - prisoner of conscience
良心の自由: (りょうしんのじゆう) - freedom of conscience
良心的: (りょうしんてき) - upright; fair; honest
良心的兵役拒否: (りょうしんてきへいえききょひ) - conscientious objection
良心的兵役拒否者: (りょうしんてきへいえききょひしゃ) - conscientious objector; CO
良性発作性頭位めまい症: (りょうせいほっさせいとういめまいしょう) - {med} benign paroxysmal positional vertigo; BPPV
良性発作性頭位目眩症: (りょうせいほっさせいとういめまいしょう) - {med} benign paroxysmal positional vertigo; BPPV
良性発作性頭位眩暈症: (りょうせいほっさせいとういめまいしょう) - {med} benign paroxysmal positional vertigo; BPPV
良性移動性舌炎: (りょうせいいどうせいぜつえん) - benign migratory glossitis; geographic tongue
良性腫瘍: (りょうせいしゅよう) - benign tumor; benign tumour
良書: (りょうしょ) - good book; valuable work
良材: (りょうざい) - good material; good timber; able persons
良案: (りょうあん) - good idea; good plan
良民: (りょうみん) - good citizens; law-abiding people
良港: (りょうこう) - good harbor; good harbour
良知良能: (りょうちりょうのう) - (yoji) one's innate intelligence and ability
